personalInfo.name: César Iván Olvera Espinosa
personalInfo.title: Doctoral Researcher @ Aalto University
personalInfo.bio: Doctoral researcher in Cloud & Network Computing at Aalto University, Finland. Working on sustainable AI, carbon-aware computing, and energy-efficient software.
personalInfo.longBio: Doctor of Science (Tech.) candidate at Aalto University (School of Electrical Engineering), researching carbon-aware workload placement, energy-efficient AI inference, and green software engineering. Background in communications engineering, and hands-on experience with networked systems, benchmarking, and sustainability-focused projects.
